book.cta-subtitle: Create a free account to add books, write reviews and connect with other readers
book.cta-title: Save this book to your shelf!
book.no-reviews: No reviews for this book yet

books-description: Add the dates you finished reading the books and organize your bookshelf by reading date
bookshelf-empty: Your bookcase does not have any books yet.
change-cover-description: Choose a different edition of this book. Your reading info and review will be transferred.
confirm-replace-message: Your reading info and review will be transferred to the new book. Are you sure?
confirmDeleteMessage:
Are you sure you want to remove this review? 
This action cannot be undone.
description: A place for you to organize everything you've read. Add your books and see what your friends are reading.
description-bottom: And find out what your friends have read
description-top: A place for you to organize everything you've read
email-conflict-explanation: What would you like to do?
email-conflict-message: The Google account has a different email than your current account:
email-verified-successfully: Email verified successfully! You can now access all features.
empty-shelf-subtitle: Start by adding books manually or importing from GoodReads
google-account-connected-description: Your account is connected to Google
google-account-not-connected-description: Connect your Google account for easier sign-in
image-alt: Homepage of the LivroLog website with a bookcase with several book covers
import-goodreads-instructions: Import your GoodReads library in 3 simple steps:
import-note: Duplicate books will be skipped. Import may take a few minutes depending on your library size.
import-step-1-desc: Click the button below to open GoodReads 'Import and export' page in a new tab
import-step-2-desc: On the GoodReads page, click 'Export Library' and wait for the CSV file to download (may take a few minutes)
import-step-3-desc: Select the goodreads_library_export.csv file you downloaded and click 'Start Import'
invalid-verification-link: Invalid or expired verification link. Please request a new one.
keywords: books, bookcase, book shelf, personal bookshelf, book organizer, book social network, add books to bookshelf, organize bookshelf

landing.cta-subtitle: Join thousands of readers who already organize their readings with us
landing.cta-text: Explore millions of books for free
landing.feature-amazon-desc: Found a book you want? Quick links to buy on Amazon
landing.feature-connect-desc: Follow friends, see what they're reading and discover new recommendations
landing.feature-import-desc: Already have a library elsewhere? Import all your books with just one click
landing.feature-organize-desc: Create your virtual bookshelf and track all the books you've read or want to read
landing.feature-privacy-desc: Choose which books are public and which ones only you can see
landing.feature-rate-desc: Share your opinions and help other readers discover great books
landing.features-subtitle: Powerful features to organize your literary life
landing.hero-subtitle: Organize your personal library, discover new books and connect with readers who share your literary taste
landing.how-subtitle: Start organizing your library in 3 simple steps
landing.search-placeholder: Search by title, author or ISBN...
landing.step1-desc: Find any book by title, author or ISBN in our extensive database
landing.step2-desc: Save the books you've read, are reading or want to read
landing.step3-desc: Follow friends and discover what they're reading
landing.testimonial1-text: Finally a simple way to organize all the books I've read. I love seeing my library grow!
landing.testimonial2-text: The best part is being able to follow my friends and discover new recommendations based on what they're reading.
landing.testimonial3-text: I imported my entire Goodreads collection in minutes. Clean interface and super easy to use.
landing.testimonials-subtitle: Join our community of passionate readers

private-book-tooltip: Makes the book private. It will be displayed on your shelf only to you. Not even your followers will be able to see it.
private-profile-description: Only followers can see your book collection
private-profile-message: This profile is private. Follow this user to see their book collection.

share-shelf-description: Share your bookshelf on social media:
share-text: Check out my bookshelf on LivroLog with {count} book! | Check out my bookshelf on LivroLog with {count} books!
subtitle1: THE PERFECT PLACE TO CATALOG YOUR BOOKS
subtitle2: With an easy-to-use interface, you can create your own virtual library of books you've already read, see what your friends are reading, and create your literary journey. Add ratings, reading date, and literary friends like you. Never lose track of the books you've already read and discover new titles. Sign up now and start building your virtual library!
title: Review title
unfollow-confirmation: Are you sure you want to unfollow {name}?
user-not-found: User not found. Please contact support.
